reviewText: If you love the Blue Band listening to the cd's of their music is always a joy.  But the way to really enjoy them is seeing them live.  On this DVD you get some classic footage, as well as spots from the 25th anniversary production.  I was able to pick mine up though for $21 at a Waterloo Iowa book store (B&N).  I would also imagine you might be able to get a hold of a copy from either IPTV or [...]  I see only the one listed here on Amazon and it is crazy priced.
